author: hollowstrawberry
description: Adds slash commands for the economy cog and a configurable bonus for the payday command.
install_msg:
ðŸ’µ __**EconomyTweaks**__
```Cog installed. Instructions:
1. Load it with [p]load economytweaks
2. Enable slash commands with [p]slash enablecog economytweaks
  2.1. Then do [p]slash sync
  2.2. Then restart Discord
3. Configure with [p]economytweakset```
short: Adds slash commands for the economy cog and a configurable bonus for the payday command.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data.
